item.title: Fallout's Ella Purnell Starring In New Serial Killer Comedy Directed By SNL Alum
item.description: Fallout star Ella Purnell has set a new film project, which will be the serial killer comedy Hot Ted, directed by SNL directing alum Hannah Levy.

item.title: Rachel Zegler's Next Movie After Snow White Is Exactly What She Needs
item.description: Disney's live-action remake of Snow White has not done well critically or commercially, which makes Rachel Zegler's next movie exactly what she needs.

item.title: Hunger Games: Sunrise On The Reaping's Record Budget Isn't Concerning, It Needs It After Reading The Book
item.description: The Hunger Games: Sunrise on the Reaping could have an enormous budget, which may facilitate some of the seriesâ€™ most ambitious scenes yet.
